title: View company hierarchy in tree visualization
description: As an enterprise sales representative, I want to view company hierarchies in a visual tree structure, so that I can understand parent-subsidiary relationships at a glance.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given a company has parent or child relationships, when I view the company profile, then I see a 'View Hierarchy' button
Given I click 'View Hierarchy', when the hierarchy loads, then I see a tree visualization with the current company highlighted
Given I am viewing a hierarchy tree, when I click on any company node, then I navigate to that company's profile
Given a hierarchy has more than 3 levels deep, when I view it, then I can expand/collapse branches

definitionOfDone.item: Performance tested with hierarchies of 100+ companies
